properties.areaDesc: Sandy Hook NJ to Fire Island Inlet NY out 20 nm; Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm; Moriches Inlet NY to Montauk Point NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 4 at 8:50AM EST until January 5 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt and seas 4 to 7 feet expected. For the Dense
Fog Advisory, dense fog will reduce visibility to one quarter
mile or less.

* WHERE...The ocean waters south of Long Island out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 AM to 6 PM EST Sunday. For
the Dense Fog Advisory, until 1 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Late tonight into Sunday, strong winds will cause
hazardous seas which could capsize or damage vessels and reduce
visibility. This morning into early afternoon, low visibility
will make navigation difficult.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

If you must navigate, proceed with caution. Use proper fog
signals. Make sure all running lights are on. Remember to use
your radar and compass.

NWSheadline: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM EST SUNDAY
